#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int sum(int);
int main()
{
    int num,test,i;
    cin>>test;
    cout<<endl;
    while(test--)
    {
        int a,b;
        cin>>num;
        b=num-45;
        while(b!=num)
        {
            if((b+sum(b))==num)
            {
                cout<<b<<endl;
                break;
            }
                b++;
        }
        if(b==num)
            cout<<"NONE"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
int sum(int a)
{
    int b=0;
    while(a)
    {
    b=b+a%10;
    a=a/10;
    }
    return b;
}
